regex: how can I open the console ingame
response:
Press the tilde key (~) or grave key (`) to enter console.
 https://i.imgur.com/drPaC0f.png

``/name WhateverNameYouWant`` on the in-game console.
You open the in-game console with the ~ or ` key (underneath ESC). If you're on a 60% keyboard it's Fn+ESC.
https://i.imgur.com/drPaC0f.png

``/name WhateverNameYouWant`` on the in-game console.
You open the in-game console with the ~ or ` key (underneath ESC). If you're on a 60% keyboard it's Fn+ESC.

The short answer is no. Our CoD clients are completely external to Steam and Steam servers (you don not play with Steam users). It is impossible to get VAC banned. The servers are completely separate from Steam. You are at no risk of receiving a VAC ban
Yes, it is required to own a copy of the game on Steam to utilize our clients

Just use the 'Unlock All' button in the barracks menu to get 10th prestige level 70 with everything unlocked. On S1 and IW6, you must type `unlockstats` in either the in-game console or the external console. MW3 does not have an unlock-all option
